ValidationRule.description: C46 - if Binder Cover Option value = Text, then the Logo for the Binder field must be Null
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( ($RecordType.Name = "Handbook HR Solutions Order Record Type"), ( ISPICKVAL(Art__c, 'Text') ), (NOT(ISPICKVAL(Logo_for_the_Binder__c, ''))), (NOT(BEGINS($Profile.Name,"HR Essentials"))), (NOT(BEGINS($Profile.Name,"System Administrator"))) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: You must not enter a Logo for the Binder value when selecting the Binder Cover Option value of 'Text'.
